entry_multiple.description: Must correctly identify the entry EV/EBITDA multiple from the transaction assumptions

exit_multiple.description: Must correctly identify the exit EV/EBITDA multiple from the transaction assumptions

hold_period_years.description: Must correctly identify the investment holding period in years

senior_debt_rate.description: Must correctly identify the senior debt interest rate as a percentage

revenue_growth_rate.description: Must correctly identify the revenue growth rate assumption as a percentage

assumptions_summary.description: Must demonstrate understanding of how to distinguish assumption cells from calculated cells in an LBO model
